oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-10-08 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 8, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer) with Ernie Newton and Kathy Copas, guest performers Nita, Rita & Ruby, and regular performers the Old Hickory Singers, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Copas; Old Hickory Singers; Nita, Rita & Ruby; Tommy Jackson; Del Wood; Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Cowboy Copas -- Down In Nashville, Tennessee (Cowboy Copas) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- Waiting For The Robert E. Lee (Old Hickory Singers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Nita, Rita & Ruby -- Whose Baby Are You (Nita, Rita & Ruby) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- When Jesus Beckons Me Home (Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert jingle (Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Del Wood -- Dream Train (Del Wood) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Copas, Cowboy; Copas, Kathy; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Old Hickory Singers; Nita, Rita & Ruby (Musical group); Robbins, Rita; Wells, Ruby
